sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { BasketWidget } from '../../../Basket/BasketWidget/BasketWidget' import { AppRouterLink } from '../../../UI/AppRouterLink' import { AppLogoIcon } from '../../../UI/Icons/AppLogoIcon' import { AppPercentIcon } from '../../../UI/Icons/AppPercentIcon' import { AppStarIcon } from '../../../UI/Icons/AppStarIcon' import { AppBonusIcon } from '../../../UI/Icons/AppBonusIcon' import { AppGoodsOnOrderIcon } from '../../../UI/Icons/AppGoodsOnOrderIcon' export const HeaderMainNav = () => { const navLinksData = [ { name: 'Акции', href: '/stock/', IconComponent: AppPercentIcon }, { name: 'Наш выбор', href: '/catalog/nash-vibor/', IconComponent: AppStarIcon }, { name: 'Бонусы', href: '/super/', IconComponent: AppBonusIcon }, { name: 'Товары под заказ', href: '#???', IconComponent: AppGoodsOnOrderIcon }, ] const navLinks = navLinksData.map(({ name, href, IconComponent }, id) => ( { name } )) const HeaderMainNavStyles = styled.div` margin-bottom: 15px; ` return (
{ navLinks }
) }
